SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated that I can't get my partner to improve his/her attitude about diabetes.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Can't Get Partner Improve Attitude

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Diabetes and me: Mean item score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Diabetes and Me: Mean

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Diabetes and me: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Diabetes and Me: Moderate

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Diabetes and me: Sum of 5 items (5, 8, 9, 16, 21).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Diabetes and Me: Sum

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated that diabetes often interrupts our plans.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Diabetes Often Interrupts Plans

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying that I am failing to help my partner manage diabetes more successfully.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Failing to Help Partner Manage

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: DDS03-Guilty Not Doing Enough to Help
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling guilty about not doing enough to help my partner with diabetes.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: DDS03-Guilty Not Doing Enough to Help
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Guilty Not Doing Enough to Help

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: DDS03-Help My Partner Always a Battle
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that trying to help my partner with his/her diabetes is always a battle.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: DDS03-Help My Partner Always a Battle
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Help My Partner Always a Battle

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - How best to help: Mean item score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - How Best to Help: Mean

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - How best to help: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - How Best to Help: Moderate

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - How best to help: Sum of 5 items (2, 6, 7, 11, 13).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - How Best to Help: Sum

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling unclear about exactly how much I should be involved in managing my partner's diabetes.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - How Involved Managing Diabetes

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: DDS03-How to Best Help Partner Manage
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying that don't know how to best help my partner manage diabetes.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: DDS03-How to Best Help Partner Manage
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - How to Best Help Partner Manage

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Hypoglycemia: Mean item score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Hypoglycemia: Mean

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Hypoglycemia: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Hypoglycemia: Moderate

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Hypoglycemia: Sum of 4 items (1, 17, 18, 19).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Hypoglycemia: Sum

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying about leaving my partner alone because of the possible danger of low blood sugars.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Leaving Alone Low Blood Sugars

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying about my partner's low blood sugars when he/she is sleeping.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Low Blood Sugars When Sleeping

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: DDS03-More I Try The Worse Things Get
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated that the more I try to help my partner manage his/her diabetes, the worse things get between us.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: DDS03-More I Try The Worse Things Get
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - More I Try The Worse Things Get

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: DDS03-Never Get a Break From Worrying
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that I never get a break from worrying about my partner's diabetes.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: DDS03-Never Get a Break From Worrying
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Never Get a Break From Worrying

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: DDS03-No One Notices Diabetes Hard On Me
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that no one notices that diabetes is hard on me, not just on my partner.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: DDS03-No One Notices Diabetes Hard On Me
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - No One Notices Diabetes Hard On Me

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Concerned that my partner and I are not working well together when it comes to diabetes.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Not Working Well Together

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling overwhelmed by the constant demands of my partner's diabetes.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Overwhelmed by Constant Demands

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - My partner's diabetes management: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Diabetes Manage: Moderate

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - My partner's diabetes management: Mean item score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Diabetes Management: Mean

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - My partner's diabetes management: Sum of 7 items (3, 4, 10, 12, 14, 15, 20).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Diabetes Management: Sum

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that my partner doesn't try hard enough to manage his/her diabetes.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Doesn't Try Hard Enough

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying about my partner's driving because of possible low blood sugars.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Driving Low Blood Sugars

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated because my partner ignores my suggestions about diabetes.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Ignores My Suggestions

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated that my partner shuts me out of his/her diabetes.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Shuts Me Out

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that I stay silent about my partner's diabetes more than I really should.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Silent About My Partner's Diabetes

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: DDS03-Taking Too Much of My Energy
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that diabetes is taking up too much of my mental and physical energy every day.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: DDS03-Taking Too Much of My Energy
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Taking Too Much of My Energy

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Total DDS score: Mean item score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Total DDS Score: Mean

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Total DDS score: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Total DDS Score: Moderate

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Total DDS score: Sum of 21 item scores.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Total DDS Score: Sum

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying about my partner's low blood sugars.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PARTNER-DDS - Worry About Low Blood Sugars
